summary: Photoshop file for the Mages robes
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][size=5][/size][/color]YOU CAN FIND THE MOD WITH THIS PROJECT HERE:

[size=6][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69289/?]Mage Outfit Texture Overhaul (HD 2K)[/url][/size]

THANKS TO ALEXANDRIEL FOR THE MOD


PSD file for my beloved project. Hope that someone will give the proper glory to this work!

edit: the master and expert robes are not finished as the other. Best way is to smooth the decoration with a rubber at 50% of transparency (opacity etc)...see the other file for reach the same result. Thanks everyone appreciate this work!
author: Rafuel
